title: Four Points by Sheraton appoints Mayank Uniyal as the Director of Sales & MarketingTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Points by Sheraton appoints Mayank Uniyal as the Director of Sales & Marketing
Four Points by Sheraton Vishakhapatnam has recently appointed Mr. Mayank Uniyal as the Director of Sales & Marketing.
Mayank comes with a vast experience of 14 years in the hospitality industry and has worked with reputed hotels including IHG, The Leela Hotels, Sarowar Hotels and Starwood Hotels. Prior to his association with Four Points by Sheraton, Vishakhapatnam, he was the Director of Sales with the 211 rooms Holiday Inn Cochin, where he led the sales, marketing and revenue functions. Apart from his job he has an ardor for swimming and travelling.
In his new role, Mayank will be spearhead Strategic Sales & Marketing initiatives to position Four Points by Sheraton, Vishakhapatnam as market leader and the hotel of choice.
On his appointment, Mayank said “I am delighted to work with Four Points by Sheraton and looking forward to working with the team to further develop the sales and marketing strategy to drive consistent growth.”
Source:- Four Points by Sheraton
